Miscellaneous Highlights: The match between India and Canada was abandoned due to a wet outfield at Lauderhill.
India finished on top of Group A in the T20 World Cup 2024 and have qualified for the Super Eight stage alongside the United States
Others: The Super 8s will be held in the West Indies, with the teams split into two groups in a single-round robin league.
The top two teams in either group will advance into the semi-finals.
